name: Pennyhill Park Hotel and The Spa

reviews.title: The Spa Makes It
reviews.text: The quality of the rooms in this hotel are inconsistent. The one that I stayed in was very large, but the furniture and decor were about 20 years out dated -- a sort of Laura Ashley meets flea market style. The walls and floors are very thin. I could hear the person in the room above me walking around and I could hear the person in the room below me snoring! My friend was staying in a newer wing (near the lobby area) and her room was much nicer - done in a tasteful, modern, country style.

description: Pennyhill Park Hotel and The Spa is a magnificent country house hotel in Bagshot, Surrey, set amongst acres of gardens and parkland including a 9 hole golf course. This five-star luxury hotel offers everything from unmatchable luxury spa breaks and treatments to fine wines, Surrey's only two Michelin star restaurant, Michael Wignall at The Latymer and impeccable service.
